title: feat: Add name button

title: Feat: sign up validation
body:
# Issue: Sign up validation
## Description

As a user, I want to receive an email with a code to validate my account when I complete the registration form

title: test: Checksum and size tested
body: Checksum and size function tested in dataset module

title: fix: Download all datasets button missed
body:
Download all datasets button now appear for logged and not logged users.

Closes #29

title: Feat/stagging area
body:
Added a Stagging area where the users will be able to leave their datasets before publishing to Zenodo (Fakenodo in our case), said datasets wont be able to be seen by others users in the platform as them are not published. Once the dataset is published, it status is updated and a DOI is assigned to them.
The functionality has been tested with unit and interface tests, as well as locust testing.

title: chore: New github workflows for Continuous integration
body: New test workflow with other python versions and format checker.

title: Fix: Add correct functionality and tests
body:
Added changes to the routes to show the correct title when using the "profile/summary/(Current_user_id)" path
Added a new unit test case to cover the new functionality

title: fix: Fakenodo for production
body: Fakenodo work for development and production

body:
Codacy workflow added for ci.

Closes #8

body: Fix code format by flake8 rules.

body: Workflows adapted and render with continuous deployment
